config.title: Tado Hijack Configuration
config.description: Choose the data update intervals and throttle settings.

data_description.scan_interval: How often to check Home/Away and HVAC state. Set to 0 to disable periodic polling (manual only). 1800s (30m) is recommended.
data_description.auto_api_quota_percent: Use X% of FREE daily quota for status polling (0 = disabled). FREE = Limit - Throttle Reserve - Metadata Updates - Offset Updates. Hybrid strategy: Uses MAX(Daily Budget - Used, Remaining * X%) → System ALWAYS continues polling even when over daily budget.
data_description.slow_poll_interval: How often to sync battery levels, firmware, capabilities and device list. Set to 0 to disable periodic updates (initial only). 24h is highly recommended.
data_description.offset_poll_interval: How often to fetch temperature offsets. Costs 1 API call PER VALVE. Set to 0 to disable (manual poll only).
data_description.debounce_time: Time window to collect rapid changes before sending to API. Default 5s.
data_description.throttle_threshold: Skip confirmation API calls when remaining quota drops below this value. Set to 0 to disable throttling.
data_description.disable_polling_when_throttled: Stop periodic polling entirely when in throttled mode.
data_description.api_proxy_url: Advanced: URL of a local tado-api-proxy instance (e.g. http://192.168.1.5:8080). Enables bypassing rate limits. Repo: https://github.com/s1adem4n/tado-api-proxy
data_description.debug_logging: Enable verbose debug logging for troubleshooting. WARNING: This will generate large log files.

data_description.scan_interval: Interval for presence and heating state. Set to 0 to disable periodic polling.
data_description.auto_api_quota_percent: Use X% of FREE daily quota for status polling (0 = disabled). FREE = Limit - Throttle - Scheduled Updates. Hybrid strategy prevents self-throttling when quota is low. Interval auto-adjusts until 12:00 CET reset.
data_description.slow_poll_interval: Interval for battery levels, firmware and device metadata. Set to 0 for initial only. 24h is sufficient.
data_description.offset_poll_interval: Interval for temperature offsets. Costs 1 API call PER VALVE. 0 = disabled.
data_description.debounce_time: Time window to collect rapid changes before sending to API. Default 5s.
data_description.throttle_threshold: Skip confirmation API calls when remaining quota drops below this value. 0 = disabled.
data_description.api_proxy_url: Advanced: URL of a local tado-api-proxy instance. Repo: https://github.com/s1adem4n/tado-api-proxy
data_description.debug_logging: Enable verbose debug logging. WARNING: Generates large log files.
